## VirtualBaseProps interface

Common props for [VirtualList](./react-virtual-scroll.virtuallist.md) and [VirtualGrid](./react-virtual-scroll.virtualgrid.md)

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface VirtualBaseProps 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [className?](./react-virtual-scroll.virtualbaseprops.classname.md) |  | string | _(Optional)_ The <code>className</code> applied to the outer container element. Use when styling the entire component. |
|  [height](./react-virtual-scroll.virtualbaseprops.height.md) |  | number |  |
|  [innerClassName?](./react-virtual-scroll.virtualbaseprops.innerclassname.md) |  | string | _(Optional)_ The <code>className</code> applied to the inner container element. Use for special cases when styling only the inner container and items. |
|  [itemData?](./react-virtual-scroll.virtualbaseprops.itemdata.md) |  | unknown | _(Optional)_ Passed as [VirtualBaseItemProps.data](./react-virtual-scroll.virtualbaseitemprops.data.md) to each child item |
|  [maxCssSize?](./react-virtual-scroll.virtualbaseprops.maxcsssize.md) |  | number | _(Optional)_ Maximum size for CSS element beyond which layout breaks. You should never normally need to change this. The default value is compatible with all major browsers. |
|  [minNumPages?](./react-virtual-scroll.virtualbaseprops.minnumpages.md) |  | number | _(Optional)_ The minimum number of virtual pages to use when inner container would otherwise be more than [VirtualBaseProps.maxCssSize](./react-virtual-scroll.virtualbaseprops.maxcsssize.md) big. You should never normally need to change this. |
|  [useIsScrolling?](./react-virtual-scroll.virtualbaseprops.useisscrolling.md) |  | boolean | _(Optional)_ Determines whether the component should track whether it's being actively scrolled and pass to child items as [VirtualBaseItemProps.isScrolling](./react-virtual-scroll.virtualbaseitemprops.isscrolling.md)<!-- -->. |
|  [width](./react-virtual-scroll.virtualbaseprops.width.md) |  | number |  |
